title: No loading screen boarder
body: I have no loading screen boarder in lobby, I got silver last season. plz help meh

replies.body: Season rewards haven't quite been delivered just yet. Wait a bit longer since they're going out over the course of the next month, but hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) if you're still concerned.

Check out the [2017 Ranked Rewards Help Desk](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-support/W0aEONuP-2017-ranked-rewards-help-desk) for more info on reward distribution!

The short answer is... be patient! Rewards will be distributed in the coming weeks :)
